pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Antiseptic Liquid 300ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Antiseptic Liquid is a 95% naturally derived and vegan friendly formula with 100% pure tea tree oil. It is a great choice for individuals looking for a natural antiseptic alternative to use on minor skin wounds, mild skin fungal infections and insect bites and stings.

Thursday Plantation's Tea Tree Antiseptic Liquid, with its 95% naturally derived and vegan friendly formula makes it a great choice for consumers looking for a natural antiseptic alternative. An Australian made antiseptic product containing 100% pure antibacterial tea tree oil, comes with multi usage function ranging from cleansing and helping relieve minor skin wounds, to decreasing symptoms of insect bites and stings and reducing symptoms of mild superficial fungal infections.

Size: 300mL

Soap-Free?: Yes

Shelf Life in Days: 730

KEY FEATURES

• 95% naturally derived
• contains 100% pure tea tree oil
• It can be used undiluted to apply wtih a wool ball to an affected area

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Skin patch test
prior to use, if sensitivity occurs discontinue use. If symptoms persist
consult your healthcare professional.

Ingredients

Melaleuca Oil 50 mg/g

Active Ingredients: Melaleuca Oil 50 mg/g

Contains: Alcohol 53% v/v

Directions

Apply this product undiluted using a cotton tipped applicator or cotton wool to the affected area two or three times daily or as required.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: below 30°C

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
